ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: that it is He Who brings about both death and life;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And He who ordains death and life;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and that He it is Who causes death and grants life,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is He who causes death and gives life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And that it is He Who gave death and gave life?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And that it is He Who causes death and gives life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And that He it is Who causes death and gives life-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and that it is He who makes to die, and that makes to live,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And that He it is Who giveth death and giveth life;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: that it is He who causes death and gives life;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And that it is He Who causeth to die and causeth to live.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: that it is He who brings death and gives life,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That it is He Who granteth Death and Life;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And that it is He (Allah) Who causes death and gives life;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and that it is He who causes to die, and causes to live
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And that it is He who gives death and life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And that it is He who causes death and gives life
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:44] and that it is He Who brings death, in this world, and gives life, for resurrection,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And that He it is Who giveth death) in the life of the world (and giveth life) for the resurrection; it is also said that this means: He gives death to fathers and life to sons;
